Model |  |  |
Plugin | pull request #2403 | pull request #2403
RaySensor | info_services branch |  |
Sensor | info_services branch |  |
SensorNoise | info_services branch | info_services branch |
Scene |  |  |
Surface |  |  |
TrackVisual |  |  |
Visual | info_services branch | info_services branch

# Ignition::msgs <-> gazebo::common

Type          | common -> ign::msgs                            | ign::msgs -> common
------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------
Color | info_services branch | info_services branch
Time |  | 


Also see issue #1903 for `gazebo::msgs`
